abilities.name: Brass Stampede
abilities.rule: Each time this unit ends a Charge move, select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of this unit and roll one D6 for each model in this unit: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Daemonic Icon
abilities.rule: Models in the bearer’s unit have a Leadership characteristic of 6+.

abilities.name: Instrument of Chaos
abilities.rule: Add 1 to Charge rolls made for the bearer’s unit.

wargear_abilities.name: Daemonic Icon
wargear_abilities.rule: Models in the bearer’s unit have a Leadership characteristic of 6+.

wargear_abilities.name: Instrument of Chaos
wargear_abilities.rule: Add 1 to Charge rolls made for the bearer’s unit.

wargear_options: ■ 1 Bloodcrusher that is not equipped with an instrument of Chaos can be equipped with 1 daemonic icon.
■ 1 Bloodcrusher that is not equipped with a daemonic icon can be equipped with 1 instrument of Chaos.
